segmentosSRT.text: This is the first recorded game of the Atlético Nacional,
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: in this filmic document of the Pelbet company.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: We will present indistinctly, according to journalistic consideration
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: the main games, the ones we consider essential
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: for the conquer of the title of 1981.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: The first goal was scored by Victor Luna and Guillermo La Rosa
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: so that he can be, as usually, close to the goal.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Apparently, the foul can't be seen clear enough.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: But let’s have a look from the reverse angle.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: The one from the cameras at the other side of the goal, placed by Pelbet’s company.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Look at that karate blow from Gonzalez Aquino to the peruvian Cesar Cueto.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text:
About ten years now, that I participate
in the parade of Silleteros.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04
